title: The Vagabond Codes
description: The Vagabond Codes is J.D. Stone’s first novel in the two-part Knight of the Apokalypse series, a hyper-realistic adventure where the artificially intelligent Vagabonds have driven humanity to the verge of extinction. A year after the catastrophic Surge, fourteen-year-old Ben Knight fights to protect his orphaned friends at his family’s hidden retreat. When Ben unexpectedly meets the mysterious Stranger, he uncovers a family secret that could change the course of history. Torn between protecting his friends and fulfilling his father’s dying wish, Ben sets out on an epic journey in search of the final link to the Vagabond Codes. Packed with heart-stopping surprises and led by inspiring characters, The Vagabond Codes will leave you breathless and longing for Book 2, due Fall 2018.
author: J.D. Stone
